COMMENTS: (SUSPENSION OF AN INSTANCE)Suspending an instance is a feature unique to Google Cloud. Suspending does not deallocate the resources assigned to the Vm and just puts the VM in hold state and incurs no cost during this time frame.
Tags and labels work differently in AWS and GCP. Having some knowledge on them would help in correct usage.

The ec2:AllocateAddress action is different from the ec2:CreateAddress action. The ec2:AllocateAddress action only allocates an EIP, but it does not assign it to an EC2 instance. To assign an EIP to an EC2 instance, you must use the ec2:AssociateAddress action.
